scripts.gettype:
export $(cat .env | xargs -d '
');printf 'give me an app id?'; read APP </dev/tty;kintone-dts-gen --app-id $APP -u $KINTONE_USERNAME -p $KINTONE_PASSWORD --host $KINTONE_BASE_URL --basic-auth-username $KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME --basic-auth-password $KINTONE_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD -o app$APP.d.ts < /dev/tty
